description: Pose variations derived from anchor images using image-to-image

variations.name: Pull-up Top Position
variations.edit_prompt: pulling body upward, chin above the bar, elbows bent and pulled down, lats fully contracted and engaged

variations.name: Pull-up Mid Position
variations.edit_prompt: body halfway up, arms bent at 90 degrees, actively pulling, mid pull-up position

variations.name: Chin-up Top Position
variations.edit_prompt: chin-up grip with palms facing body, chin above bar, biceps fully contracted

variations.name: Dead Hang
variations.edit_prompt: completely relaxed hang, arms fully extended, shoulders stretched, passive hang position

variations.name: Barbell Row Start
variations.edit_prompt: gripping barbell with both hands, arms extended down, bent over position, preparing to row

variations.name: Barbell Row Top
variations.edit_prompt: pulling barbell to lower chest, elbows driven back, squeezing shoulder blades together

variations.name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
variations.edit_prompt: one arm rowing dumbbell up, other arm braced on bench, torso stable

variations.name: Deadlift Start Position
variations.edit_prompt: gripping barbell on ground, hips hinged back, knees bent, preparing to lift

variations.name: Deadlift Lockout
variations.edit_prompt: standing tall holding barbell at thigh level, hips fully extended, chest proud

variations.name: Lat Pulldown Start
variations.edit_prompt: seated at lat pulldown machine, arms extended overhead gripping wide bar

variations.name: Lat Pulldown Bottom
variations.edit_prompt: pulling bar down to upper chest, elbows driven down, lats contracted

variations.name: Seated Cable Row Start
variations.edit_prompt: seated at cable row, arms extended forward gripping handle, back straight

variations.name: Seated Cable Row Contracted
variations.edit_prompt: pulling cable handle to abdomen, elbows back, squeezing shoulder blades

variations.name: Shoulder Press Start
variations.edit_prompt: holding dumbbells at shoulder level, elbows bent, preparing to press overhead

variations.name: Shoulder Press Top
variations.edit_prompt: arms fully extended overhead pressing dumbbells, shoulders engaged

variations.name: Bicep Curl Start
variations.edit_prompt: standing holding dumbbells at sides, arms extended, palms facing forward

variations.name: Bicep Curl Top
variations.edit_prompt: curling dumbbells up, biceps fully contracted, elbows at sides

variations.name: Front Double Bicep Pose
variations.edit_prompt: classic bodybuilding front double bicep pose, arms raised and flexed, showing bicep peaks

variations.name: Rear Lat Spread
variations.edit_prompt: back to camera, hands on hips, lats flared wide, classic lat spread pose

variations.name: Rear Double Bicep
variations.edit_prompt: back to camera, arms raised in double bicep pose showing back definition

variations.name: Squat Bottom Position
variations.edit_prompt: deep squat position, thighs below parallel, barbell on upper back, side view

variations.name: Lunge Position
variations.edit_prompt: forward lunge position, front knee bent 90 degrees, back knee lowered, holding dumbbells

variations.name: Plank Hold
variations.edit_prompt: plank position on forearms, body straight and rigid, core engaged, side view

variations.name: Push-up Top
variations.edit_prompt: push-up top position, arms extended, body straight, side view

variations.name: Push-up Bottom
variations.edit_prompt: push-up bottom position, chest near ground, elbows bent, body straight
